title: Can I please get a refund on the 10 augment caches I just bought?
body: I can't even use them because after the last patch, the client crashes whenever I go to the hextech crafting menu.

replies.body: We're currently tracking an issue causing some players to crash when opening hextech crafting.  Your specific issue could be due to a a Windows update, but third party apps have been known to cause this as well.  As a first step, disable any apps running like play.tv or overwolf as examples.  Let me know your results!
